title: Export Strategy Code
noRulesError: No entry rules defined. Create a strategy first.
noCodeYet: No code generated yet. Create a strategy with entry rules first.

mql5Notes.title: MQL5 Notes:
mql5Notes.note1: All indicators use custom implementations matching the backtester engine exactly
mql5Notes.note2: Place the BT_*.mq5 indicator files in your MQL5/Indicators/ folder
mql5Notes.note3: Compile all indicator files and the EA in MetaEditor before using
mql5Notes.note4: Adjust the Magic Number input to avoid conflicts with other EAs
mql5Notes.note5: Test in Strategy Tester before deploying to a live account

pineNotes.title: Pine Script Notes:
pineNotes.note1: Copy the code to TradingView's Pine Editor and add to chart
pineNotes.note2: Commission and slippage are configured in the strategy() declaration
pineNotes.note3: Position sizing may need manual adjustment for your account size
pineNotes.note4: ADX uses ta.dmi() which may behave slightly differently
pineNotes.note5: Backtest results will differ due to platform differences in order execution
